category.name: Maps - DD Lost Mine of Phandelver
Monsters - DD Lost Mine of Phandelver
NPCs - DD Lost Mine of Phandelver

text.p: Member of the Order of the Gauntlet with a quest for the party.
Daran Edermath is a 107 year old male half-elf soldier.
He has short, straight, silver hair and green eyes.
He has smooth, regular skin with a green complexion.
He stands 142cm tall and has an athletic build.
He has an oval, ordinary face with a very short chin strap.
He is branded as a slave on his right eyebrow.
Personality Traits
He discretely worships Tempus, God of war, battle, warriors. (Chaotic Neutral)
He shows very little empathy towards others.
He is very pessimistic.
He will never say no to a duel. He believes that he is related to Chauntea.
Relationships
Sexual Orientation: Straight
Relationship Status: In a relationship
Member of the Zhentarim with a quest for the party.
Guildmaster of Phandalin Miner's Exchange
47 years old female human banker.
She has short, curled, black hair and green eyes.
She has rough, very tanned skin with a pink complexion.
She stands 167cm tall and has an athletic build.
She has a soft, very pretty face.
She gestures profusely during a conversation.
Personality Traits
She fervently worships Akadi, Goddess of air, movement and speed. (True Neutral)
She is very cynical.
She is very good at keeping secrets.
She likes to know how things work. She doesn't like her profession, has always dreamed of becoming a banker. She considers everybody else as idiots.
Relationships
Sexual Orientation: Straight
Relationship Status: Married and having an affair
Alignment Tendencies
Good 1 Lawful -2
Neutral 0 Neutral 2
Evil -1 Chaotic 0
Runs a trading post and offers a reward for retrieving her supplies.
Linene Graywind is a 35 years old female human merchant.
She has cropped, straight, brown hair and blue eyes.
She has rough, dark skin with a brown complexion.
She stands 172cm tall and has a skinny build.
She has a round, ordinary face.
She has 3 elaborate piercings on her right ear, 3 large piercings on her forehead.
Personality Traits
She discretely worships Kelemvor, God of death and the dead. (Lawful Neutral)
She is very patient.
She can't keep a secret.
She inherited a creepy house. She believes that he is related to Selune.
Relationships
Sexual Orientation: Straight
Relationship Status: Widowed
Alignment Tendencies
Good 3 Lawful 4
Neutral 3 Neutral 3
Evil -6 Chaotic -2
